statements: DELETE FROM ridesharing_data WHERE user_id = 123 AND ride_date = '2022-08-10';
DELETE FROM ridesharing_data WHERE available_seats < 2 AND source_location LIKE 'City%' AND destination_location = 'Suburb';
DELETE FROM rides WHERE user_id = 1 AND fare > 50;
DELETE FROM Driver WHERE driver_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Ride WHERE passenger_count < 3 AND driver_rating < 4.0;
DELETE FROM rides WHERE remaining_seats <= 2 AND departure_city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM rides WHERE driver_id = 5 AND departure_city = 'New York';
